Description: his profile has been developed to support the work of the Dementia Intelligence Network (DIN) in providing health intelligence with which to inform the provision of care of people in England who have dementia. These indicators are at Clinical Commissioning Group (CCG) and Local Authority geographies and give local commissioners and providers the information they need to benchmark current practice against other CCGs, local authorities and England. Data and metadata are available online and as a download document.
Name: Dementia Profile
Route from landing page to data: Fingertips Data can be located by clicking on the Green box named 'Start Go to the data' to the right of the introduction.
Sizing Notes: Fingertips  May be better suited to the mental health family.
